attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government must stamp out racist behavior that bars an English girl from a job with the Environment Agency on the grounds that she is the wrong kind of white? This was reported in The Mail on Sunday, August 5, 2007

rejection.details: The title of a petition should be a request for action, not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
